item.title: How to improve your UX (user experience)
item.description: How to improve your UX User experience (UX) can be defined as the evoked emotion experienced by the individual navigating your application interface.

item.title: Is JavaScript still necessary
item.description: Do you need JavaScript these days JavaScript is one of the most used programming languages in the industry, it is used in data-science, web-development and game development.

item.title: Top five reasons to use Github

item.title: why python is so popular
item.description: Is python right for you Despite it slower performance million if developer, data scientist and other love python here are five reason why i think python is so popular learning curve Python has a short learning curve and is often recommended to beginners.
